title: What’s new on Netflix UK? All the new TV shows and films in November 2018
description:
![Netflix](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

## What’s new on Netflix UK this month? All the new films and TV shows coming
in November 2018

**‘Tis the season to comfort-eat, set fire to stuff, and reminisce endlessly
about the summer. November is here, bringing with it the joys of inescapable
sniffles, numb fingers and extremely short days. Great stuff. It’s also time
for a whole new batch of TV shows and films to hit Netflix.**

October was an excellent month, bringing with it the likes of 22 July, a film
based on Anders Breivik’s 2011 terror attacks in Norway, Making a Murderer:
Part 2, and Chilling Adventures of Sabrina.

November’s not quite as exciting, but there’s still lots to look forward to,
including the sixth and final season of House of Cards (November 2), as well
as… erm… 2 Guns (November 16) and Ali G Indahouse (November 9).

**Related:[Best horror movies on Netflix
](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/best-horror-movies-netflix-halloween-
films-3607041)**

Here’s what’s new on Netflix in the UK in November 2018.
